General.Name: Shanyuan Co Ltd
General.Description: Shanyuan Co., Ltd. engages in the construction of residential buildings in Taiwan. It also engages in the sale and rental of commercial office buildings and storefronts, and other properties. The company was formerly known as Fu Chan Industrial Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shanyuan Co., Ltd. in January 2008. Shanyuan Co., Ltd. was founded in 1979 and is based in Taipei , Taiwan.

1.Name: Yalin  Wang
1.Title: GM of Bus. Planning Department & Director
